p: Other loci, with some information on allelic associations, include those coding for ICAM3 (DC-SIGN, CD209) ( Chan et al., 2007; Chan et al., 2010) and DC-SIGNR (CD209L) ( Li et al., 2008) and widely studied loci such as MBL ( Zhang et al., 2005; Ip et al., 2005) and CD14. In particular, the inflammatory response associated with SARS suggests a number of candidate loci e.g. AHSG ( Zhu et al., 2011), IFNG ( Chong et al., 2006), CD14 ( Yuan et al., 2007) and CCL5 (Rantes) ( Ng et al., 2007). Nevertheless, some relatively small studies have resulted in some conflicting findings being noted e.g. for MBL ( Yuan et al., 2005) and DC-SIGNR ( Li et al., 2008).
